data.title: Melissa Fumero: Wiki, Husband, Height, Net worth, Career
data.meta_description: Actress and filmmaker Melissa Fumero is originally from the United States. Melissa Fumero is best known for her role as Amy Santiago in “Brooklyn
data.text:
Actress and filmmaker Melissa Fumero is originally from the United States. Melissa Fumero is best known for her role as Amy Santiago in “Brooklyn Nine-Nine,” an American police procedural comedy.

Melissa Fumero has also been a series regular since 2013, and in the 2019 season six episode, “The Return of the King,” she made her directorial debut. For her work on the show, she also received an NHMC Impact Award.

What is Melissa Fumero’s net worth? Salary, Earnings

She has obtained important fruits from her professional career as an actress and director. In the 16 years since she began acting, she has advanced to become one of the best-known actresses around.

No doubt, he makes money from his movies, TV shows, and social media channels. Furthermore, as of February 2023, his total net worth (including earnings) is expected to be around $4 million.

Where was Melissa Fumero born? Ethnicity, Nationality, Family, Education

Melissa Fumero was born on August 19, 1982 in North Bergen, New Jersey. Melissa Gallo is her real name. She is a resident of the United States. Melissa Fumero is mixed race and was born under the sign of Leo. She is of Cuban descent. She is 39 years old.

Likewise, Carlos and Martha Gallo were the parents of the child (father). His father was an archaeologist and his mother had previously worked as a tourist guide. Melissa Fumero’s parents settled in the United States after arriving as teenagers from Cuba. Her sisters are Julia and Julia Gallo, and she has brothers named Maximillian and Johanna Gallo.

Her family moved to Lyndhurst, New Jersey, when she was six years old, leaving Gutenberg, New Jersey. She has always loved to dance and she has taken several different dance classes since she was a child.

Lyndhurst High School was their best choice for a school. She continued her education at New York University, where in 2003 she earned a Bachelor of Fine Arts in theater. She then decided to pursue acting as a career.

Is Melissa Fumero married? Relationship

Melissa Fumero is a woman who has been married, but to only one man. She co-starred in the television series “One Life to Live” with David Fumero and the two married on December 9, 2007.

Two children have already been born to a happy couple. Axel was born on February 14, 2020 and Enzo, her second child, was born on March 14, 2016. The couple currently lives in Los Angeles, California.

How tall is Melissa Fumero? Weight, hair color

Melissa Fumero is a beautiful lady in her 30s with a curvy figure. She is 1.75 meters (5 feet 9 inches) tall and weighs around 62 kilograms (137 pounds). Her body measurements are 34-23-34 inches and she wears a bra size 34B, a dress size 4 (US), and a shoe size 8 (US). (US). She has brown eyes, black hair and a light complexion.

How did Melissa Fumero start her Professional Career?

After 208 episodes and 208 appearances, Melissa Fumero left the American soap opera “One Life to Live” in 2011. She made her acting debut in 2004 as Adriana Cramer.

In the 2007 American thriller “Descent,” she played Dorm Girl #2; Similarly, in the 2009 American independent comedy “I Hope They Serve Beer in Hell,” she played Melissa; and that same year, she played Ati in the film “Tiny Dancer” and Jo in the 11-episode online series “Haute & Bothered.”

All My Sons, Important Things with Demetri Martin, Match Game, Room 104, Mourners, Inc., Once Day at a Time, The Mentalist, Royal Pains, Men at Work, Top Chef Duels, Mack & Moxy and The $100,000 Pyramid are just some of the shows and series in which he has appeared as a guest star.

Her career took off in 2013 when she was chosen to play Amy Santiago, the title character, in the American police comedy television series “Brooklyn Nine-Nine”, for which she received three Imagen Award nominations and an NHMC Award.

She has appeared in 153 episodes of “Brooklyn Nine-Nine,” made her directorial debut in 2019 with the season 6 episode “Return of the King,” and will reprise her role as Amy Santiago in the show’s final season, which will debut on August 12, 2021.

Melissa Fumero has lent her voice to “Elena of Avalor,” “Big City Greens,” “She-Ra and the Princesses of Power,” and “MODOK” among the animated series. She has appeared in two short films, “Half Vacuum” and “Stolen Hearts,” and in 2019 she appeared on an episode of “America’s Got Talent: The Champions.”
